attributes.action: Reduce fuel poverty by Increasing tax on oil companies instead of forcing loans
attributes.additional_details: Other countries aren't experiencing anywhere near the amount of raise in consumer prices, so we shouldn't either. Its going to have a detrimental effect on millions of households throughout the UK and will become the next crisis.
attributes.background:
In the energy cap rise, average household bills will rise by over £700 which is double. Current plans to make every household take a £200 loan repayable over 5 years aren't a solution and taking the sting out of it, isn't good enough.

Increase taxes at the source i.e. the big oil companies
